Posts.Content: I agree !!!!! We carry on regardless ,we are strong.Take some time to step back and think about everything we do on a daily basis without even realizing.Well done all you women out there battling this crap,still looking after kids,husband ,working,running a house.I shall step off my soap box now !!
Posts.Title: It's International Women's Day !!

Posts.Content: Hi there I know this isn't quite the same but this time last year I was being treated for anal cancer.the very next day after I'd finished treatment I had to have a mammogram(how I got there is beyond me !!)Anyway,within that week I had a recall letter.I cried and cried thinking not more crap and I had to wait nearly 2 weeks for the appointment.when I got there she scanned me and showed me why they called me back,loads of cysts .everything was fine,they just wanted to make doubley sure.so I'm sending big hugs and fingers crossed for you.xx
Posts.Title: Mammogram
